segments.text: Your search on this project has been excellent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I couldn â€™ t have done it without the help of a strong team .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The final report is exceptionally thorough and well done . I think that you have been come up with some interesting recommendations for the client .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I hope the client feels the same way !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sure they will be pleased .
segments.speaker: S1
